original_text: Thou shalt burn with fire a third part in the midst of the city, when the days of the siege are fulfilled: and thou shalt take a third part, and smite about it with a knife: and a third part thou shalt scatter in the wind; and I will draw out a sword after them.
korean_text: 그 성읍을 에워싸는 날이 차거든 너는 터럭 삼분의 일은 성읍 안에서 불사르고 삼분의 일은 성읍 사방에서 칼로 치고 또 삼분의 일은 바람에 흩으라 내가 그 뒤를 따라 칼을 빼리라

sentences.original_text: a third part in the midst of the city
when the days of the siege are fulfilled
and thou shalt take a third part
and smite about it with a knife
and a third part thou shalt scatter in the wind
and I will draw out a sword after them
